item.title: Staff Engineer Book and why you should read it
item.description: If you are: Looking for a new book to read during the holidays. A senior software engineer looking for an opportunity to grow to staff/principal. A staff/principal/distinguished software engineer trying to fit yourself into this new career model or be better at it. I have a great recommendation for you: Staff Engineer: Leadership beyond the management track by Will Larson. You can find it on its website and on Amazon
